016package de.cuioss.uimodel.result;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020import java.io.Serializable;
021import java.util.Optional;
022import java.util.function.Function;
023
024import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
025import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
026import lombok.ToString;
027
028/**
029 * A {@link ResultObject} that can store results that are not mandatory from the
030 * domain context. E.g. the parent of a node object that can also be a root node
031 * without a parent. To allow serialization the result will be stored as
032 * nullable object and transformed in an {@link Optional} for
033 * {@link ResultObject#getResult()}.
034 *
035 * @param <T> identifying the type of the result
036 */
037@ToString(callSuper = true, of = "result", doNotUseGetters = true)
038@EqualsAndHashCode(callSuper = true, of = "result", doNotUseGetters = true)
039public class ResultOptional<T extends Serializable> extends ResultObject<Optional<T>> {
040
041    private static final long serialVersionUID = 4619738393641630076L;
042
043    private final T result;
044
045    /**
046     * @param result       is mandatory
047     * @param state        {@linkplain ResultState} is mandatory
048     * @param resultDetail is mandatory if requestResultState is not
049     *                     {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
050     * @param errorCode
051     *
052     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any condition is violated
053     */
054    public ResultOptional(final T result, final ResultState state, final ResultDetail resultDetail,
055            final Enum<?> errorCode) {
056        super(state, resultDetail, errorCode);
057
058        this.result = result;
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * @param <R>            identifying the type of the result
063     * @param previousResult to be copied from
064     * @param mapper         used for transforming the previous result into the
065     *                       current
066     */
067    public <R extends Serializable> ResultOptional(ResultOptional<R> previousResult, Function<R, T> mapper) {
068        super(previousResult.getState(), previousResult.getResultDetail().orElse(null),
069                previousResult.getErrorCode().orElse(null));
070        if (previousResult.isValid() && previousResult.getResult().isPresent()) {
071            result = mapper.apply(previousResult.result);
072        } else {
073            result = null;
074        }
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * @param result is mandatory
079     * @param state  {@linkplain ResultState} is mandatory
080     *
081     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any condition is violated
082     */
083    public ResultOptional(final T result, final ResultState state) {
084        this(result, state, null, null);
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public Optional<T> getResult() {
089        return Optional.ofNullable(result);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Builder factory method
094     *
095     * @return new created typed builder
096     */
097    public static <R extends Serializable> ResultOptional.Builder<R> optionalBuilder() {
098        return new ResultOptional.Builder<>();
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * ResultObject Builder
103     *
104     * @param <S> bounded result type
105     */
106    public static class Builder<S extends Serializable> {
107
108        private static final String THE_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY = "The ResultDetail is mandatory if state is not VALID.";
109
110        private static final String STATE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE = "It make no sense to continue because state is not available!";
111        private static final String ALREADY_FAILED = "Already failed: ";
112
113        private S tempResult;
114
115        private ResultState tempState;
116
117        private ResultDetail tempRequestResultDetail;
118
119        private Enum<?> tempErrorCode;
120
121        /**
122         * @param result is mandatory
123         *
124         * @return {@linkplain de.cuioss.uimodel.result.ResultOptional.Builder} in
125         *         fluent api style
126         */
127        public ResultOptional.Builder<S> result(final S result) {
128            tempResult = result;
129            return this;
130        }
131
132        /**
133         * @param state is mandatory
134         *
135         * @return {@linkplain de.cuioss.uimodel.result.ResultOptional.Builder} in
136         *         fluent api style
137         */
138        public ResultOptional.Builder<S> state(final ResultState state) {
139            tempState = requireNonNull(state, "state");
140            return this;
141        }
142
143        /**
144         * @param resultDetail is optional if state is {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
145         *
146         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
147         */
148        public ResultOptional.Builder<S> resultDetail(final ResultDetail resultDetail) {
149            ResultObject.logDetail(ALREADY_FAILED, tempState, tempRequestResultDetail,
150                    new CuiLogger(ResultOptional.Builder.class));
151            tempRequestResultDetail = resultDetail;
152            return this;
153        }
154
155        /**
156         * @param errorCode is optional if state is {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
157         *
158         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
159         */
160        public ResultOptional.Builder<S> errorCode(Enum<?> errorCode) {
161            tempErrorCode = errorCode;
162            return this;
163        }
164
165        /**
166         * Reuse {@linkplain ResultState} and {@linkplain ResultObject} from previous
167         * {@linkplain ResultObject}
168         *
169         * @param previousResult {@linkplain ResultObject} must not be {@code null}
170         *
171         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
172         */
173        public ResultOptional.Builder<S> extractStateAndDetailsAndErrorCodeFrom(final ResultObject<?> previousResult) {
174            requireNonNull(previousResult, "PreviousResult must not be null");
175            return state(previousResult.getState()).resultDetail(previousResult.getResultDetail().orElse(null))
176                    .errorCode(previousResult.getErrorCode().orElse(null));
177        }
178
179        /**
180         * <h4>Preconditions</h4>
181         * <ul>
182         * <li>result or validDefaultResult as fall-back must be available</li>
183         * <li>state must be available</li>
184         * <li>if state is not {@linkplain ResultState#VALID} requestResultDetail must
185         * be available</li>
186         * </ul>
187         *
188         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject} if possible
189         * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if you try to ignore conditions
190         */
191        public ResultOptional<S> build() {
192
193            if (null == tempState) {
194                throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(STATE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE);
195            }
196
197            if (!ResultState.VALID.equals(tempState) && null == tempRequestResultDetail) {
198                throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(THE_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY);
199            }
200
201            return new ResultOptional<>(tempResult, tempState, tempRequestResultDetail, tempErrorCode);
202
203        }
204
205        @SuppressWarnings("squid:S3655") // owolff: IsPresent is explicitly checked
206        private void throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(final String errorMsg) {
207            if (null != tempRequestResultDetail && tempRequestResultDetail.getCause().isPresent()) {
208                final var newErrorMsg = errorMsg + "\nThere exits additional error occurs before :";
209                throw new UnsupportedOperationException(newErrorMsg, tempRequestResultDetail.getCause().get());
210            }
211            throw new UnsupportedOperationException(errorMsg);
212        }
213    }
214}
